From: Chad Bohannan <chad@...>
>Great paper. Easy to read, good content. It seems so obvious once you spell it 
> out. 

Thanks. :)

> I did have a question about one table:
>
> Type Avg. minutes per run (rounded to nearest minute)
> COMPLEXIFYING 216
> SIMPLIFYING 210
> BLENDED 170
> 
> Is this to process a constant number of generations, or to achieve a certain 
> fitness against the hand coded opponents?

This is for processing a set number of generations, in this case a
population of 200 individuals for 200 generations each.

Derek
